did.unittitle: A. H. Leonowens to John Williamson Palmer

scopecontent.p: Identifies a photograph [not present] as the younger half-brother of "His Majesty of Siam"; discusses the progress of "The English Governess in the Court of Siam"; and thanks Palmer for advice.

did.unittitle: Royal Cortissoz to John Williamson Palmer

scopecontent.p: Returns the ballad and thanks Palmer for his note. "Braddock" written in pencil at the bottom of the letter

did.unittitle: Dresden Propert to John Williamson Palmer

scopecontent.p: Says he can make a first-rate plate of the proposed view at Richmond; and agrees to Palmer's terms.
